metadata.title: CVE-2024-9401 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 130, Firefox ESR 115.15, Firefox ESR128.2, and Thunderbird 128.2. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memorycorruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could havebeen exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox <131, Firefox ESR < 128.3, Firefox ESR < 115.16, Thunderbird < 128.3, andThunderbird < 131.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
